item.title: Former Valve inventor launches Kickstarterfor VR glasses
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

Jeri Ellsworth? Weren’t she the one who called Valve a Highschool or some shit like that?

Did you even read the article?
~
This all sounds like some dumb hype, that ends up with the glasses being overpriced, and everyone losing their shit because of the price or, because they accidently took the wrong glasses to work.

Read full topic
